attributes.action: Get more social workers in to work with families to prevent riots occuring again!
attributes.additional_details: More social worker jobs need to be made. They need to be getting involved with more families straight up and helping to educate and improve families well-being so that they do not have to resort to looting shops and causing trouble! If there was more social workers available to work with families then there would be less kids out on the street getting up to no good!
